mapper.select: select count(*) from item where category_no=#{categoryNo}
select no, name, description, money, thumbnail, display, category_no as categoryNo from item order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into item(name, description, money, thumbnail, display, category_no) values( #{name}, #{description}, #{money}, #{thumbnail}, #{display}, #{categoryNo} )
mapper.update: update item set name=#{name}, description=#{description}, money=#{money}, thumbnail=#{thumbnail}, category_no=#{categoryNo} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select no, name, description, money, thumbnail, display, category_no as categoryNo from item where display='TRUE' order by no desc
